Field Documentation

struct cl_lock* lovsub_lock::lss_active [read]

Top-lock that initiated current operation on this sub-lock.

This is only set during top-to-bottom lock operations like enqueue, and is used to optimize state change notification. Protected by cl_lock::cll_guard mutex.

See also:
lovsub_lock_state_one().

Definition at line 354 of file lov_cl_internal.h.
